nodes.text: Vergesso V was one of five valueless asteroid rings orbiting the yellow star Lybeya in the Outer Rim Territories' Lybeya system. The five asteroid fields, which comprised the larger Vergesso Asteroids, were the sundered remains of planets, created by some unknown force, possibly an encounter with a rogue star. Vergesso V was the only asteroid belt in the system not to contain a charted major planetoid.
